thread.title: Hamilton heeds his father's words as title nears

title: Hamilton heeds his father's words as title nears
text:
Published By: Reuters - Sports - Today 
SOCHI, Russia (Reuters) - Lewis Hamilton has his father's words in mind as he stands on the brink of a third Formula One world championship....
